results.name: Triangle read by rows, T(n,k) = 1 if n is prime, 0 otherwise.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Rows n = 1..125 of table, flattened
formula: Triangle read by rows, T(n,k) = 1 if n is prime, 0 otherwise. Mobius transform (A054525) of triangle A143535.
example: First few rows of the triangle =
program: a143536_tabl = zipWith take [1..] $ map repeat a010051_list
